text: aur ve kahate hai, "jo kuchh in jaanavaron ke pet mein hai vah bilkul hamaare purushon hee ke lie hai aur vah hamaaree patniyon ke lie varjit hai. parantu yadi vah murda ho, to ve sab usamen shareek hai." sheeghr hee vah unhen unake aisa kahane ka badala dega. nissandeh vah tatvadarshee, sarvagy hai
